summary: This bill addresses the actions of a "Misbehaving Content Scraper." It instructs the scraper to respect robots.txt rules and acknowledges that its IP address has been rate limited. It directs the entity to utilize the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download service, providing a specific URL for bulk data access.  The bill aims to regulate data scraping behavior and ensure responsible use of government resources. This text is very brief and does not provide much specific information beyond these basic instructions and error messages.
